children.name: adultery
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not commit adultery. Thou shalt not steal.

children.name: am
children.sourceText: I am the Lord thy God, who hath brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage.

children.name: are
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not make unto thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing in heaven above, or things which are in the earth beneath.

children.name: ass
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's house, thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's wife, nor his man-servant, nor his maid-servant, nor his ox, nor his ass, nor anything that is thy neighbor's.

children.name: be
children.sourceText: A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you, like unto me; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you. And it shall come to pass that all those who will not hear that prophet shall be cut off from among the people.

children.name: bear
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not bear false witness against thy neighbor.

children.name: bondage
children.sourceText: I am the Lord thy God, who hath brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage.

children.name: bow
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not bow down thyself unto them, nor serve them; for I the Lord thy God am a jealous God, visiting the iniquities of the fathers upon the children, unto the third and fourth generations of them that hate me;

children.name: brethren
children.sourceText: A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you. And it shall come to pass that every soul who will not hear that prophet shall be cut off from among the people.

children.name: brought
children.sourceText: I am the Lord thy God, who hath brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage.

children.name: cattle
children.sourceText: But the seventh day, the sabbath of the Lord thy God, thou shalt not do any work, thou, nor thy son, nor thy daughter, thy man-servant, nor thy maid-servant, nor thy cattle, nor thy stranger that is within thy gates;

children.name: children
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not bow down thyself unto them, nor serve them; for I the Lord thy God am a jealous God, visiting the iniquities of the fathers upon the children, unto the third and fourth generations of them that hate me;

children.name: commandments
children.sourceText: And showing mercy unto thousands of them that love me and keep my commandments.

children.name: commit
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not commit adultery. Thou shalt not steal.

children.name: covet
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's house, thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's wife, nor his man-servant, nor his maid-servant, nor his ox, nor his ass, nor anything that is thy neighbor's.

children.name: cut
children.sourceText: A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you, like unto me; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you. And it shall come to pass that all those who will not hear that prophet shall be cut off from among the people.

children.name: daughter
children.sourceText: But the seventh day, the sabbath of the Lord thy God, thou shalt not do any work, thou, nor thy son, nor thy daughter, thy man-servant, nor thy maid-servant, nor thy cattle, nor thy stranger that is within thy gates;

children.name: day
children.sourceText: Remember the sabbath day, to keep it holy.

children.name: days
children.sourceText: Six days shalt thou labor, and do all thy work;

children.name: do
children.sourceText: Six days shalt thou labor, and do all thy work;

children.name: earth
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not make unto thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing in heaven above, or things which are in the earth beneath.

children.name: Egypt
children.sourceText: I am the Lord thy God, who hath brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage.

children.name: father
children.sourceText: Honor thy father and thy mother, that thy days may be long upon the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee.

children.name: fathers
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not bow down thyself unto them, nor serve them; for I the Lord thy God am a jealous God, visiting the iniquities of the fathers upon the children, unto the third and fourth generations of them that hate me;

children.name: have

children.name: hold
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not take the name of the Lord thy God in vain; for the Lord will not hold him guiltless that taketh his name in vain.

children.name: image

children.name: is
children.sourceText: But the seventh day, the sabbath of the Lord thy God, thou shalt not do any work, thou, nor thy son, nor thy daughter, thy man-servant, nor thy maid-servant, nor thy cattle, nor thy stranger that is within thy gates;

children.name: love
children.sourceText: And showing mercy unto thousands of them that love me and keep my commandments.

children.name: made
children.sourceText: For in six days the Lord made heaven and earth, and the sea, and all that in them is; wherefore the Lord blessed the sabbath day, and hallowed it.

children.name: mercy

children.sourceText: Thou shalt not bow down thyself unto them, nor serve them; for I the Lord thy God am a jealous God, visiting the iniquities of the fathers upon the children, unto the third and fourth generations of them that hate me;
